title: HIGHLIGHTS-Super Rugby week five
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:41 AM / Updated 10 hours ago HIGHLIGHTS-Super Rugby week five March 16 (Reuters) - Super Rugby highlights from week five: CHIEFS 41 BULLS 28 Lock Brodie Retallick scored two tries and had a hand in another as he virtually seized his side by the scruff of the neck to produce a fiery second half and overcome a surprisingly expansive Bulls side in Hamilton. Jonathan Fa’auli, Mitch Brown, Solomon Alaimalo and Anton-Leinert-Brown also crossed for the home side, who had to twice fight back from a 14-point deficit as the Bulls threw the ball around. Divan Rossouw (two), Warrick Gelant and Handre Pollard all crossed for the Bulls, who were kept scoreless in the second half, but were outstanding with the ball in hand in the first 40 minutes.
